body_html: CTC loss calculation can be numerically unstable. So it's better to keep it at least 32 bits. Since it's only implemented on CPU, there's essentially no benefit to having a float16 version.
body_text: CTC loss calculation can be numerically unstable.  So it's better to keep it at least 32 bits.  Since it's only implemented on CPU, there's essentially no benefit to having a float16 version.
body: CTC loss calculation can be numerically unstable.  So it's better to keep it at least 32 bits.  Since it's only implemented on CPU, there's essentially no benefit to having a float16 version.
